languages.text: "Да". {n}Мужчина чуть отворачивается и прочищает горло. В помещении начинает заметно теплеть.{/n} "Судя по тому, что вы знаете, кто я, и не торопитесь меня прикончить, вы служите {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императору{/g}, а не его врагам. Позвольте представиться — Хейнрикс ван Калокс, дознаватель высокочтимого Ордо Ксенос Инквизиции Императора. С кем имею честь?"

traits.locale_text: "Да". {n}Мужчина чуть отворачивается и прочищает горло. В помещении начинает заметно теплеть.{/n} "Судя по тому, что вы знаете, кто я, и не торопитесь меня прикончить, вы служите {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императору{/g}, а не его врагам. Позвольте представиться — Хейнрикс ван Калокс, дознаватель священного Ордо Ксенос Инквизиции Императора. С кем имею честь?"

languages.text: "Yes." {n}The man turns away slightly to clear his throat. The room starts to get noticeably warmer.{/n} "Since you know who I am and are in no hurry to kill me, I infer that you serve the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, not His enemies. Allow me to introduce myself — Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos. With whom do I have the pleasure of speaking?"

Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's Holy Ordo Xenos. With whom do I have the pleasure?"

"Yes." {n}The man turns away slightly to clear his throat. Allow me to introduce myself — Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos. With whom do I have the pleasure of speaking?"

languages.text: “没错。”{n}男人微微转过了身，清了清嗓子，房间里明显开始变得暖和起来。{/n}“既然你知道我是谁，而且并不急于杀我，我推测你并非{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}的敌人，而是祂的仆人。请允许我自我介绍一下，我是帝国审讯官海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯，来自神圣异形审判庭。我很荣幸与你交谈，请问你是哪位？”
languages.original_text: "Yes." {n}The man turns away slightly to clear his throat. The room starts to get noticeably warmer.{/n} "Since you know who I am and are in no hurry to kill me, I infer that you serve the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, not His enemies. Allow me to introduce myself — Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos. With whom do I have the pleasure of speaking?"

traits.locale_text: “没错。”{n}男人微微转过了身，清了清嗓子，房间里明显开始变得暖和起来。{/n}“既然你知道我是谁，而且并不急于杀我，我推测你并非{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}的敌人，而是祂的仆人。请允许我自我介绍一下，我是帝国审讯官海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯，来自神圣异形审判庭。我很荣幸与你交谈，请问你是哪位？”

languages.text: 「そうです」{n} 男はわずかに背を向けて咳払いをした。部屋は明らかに暖かくなっていた。{/n}「我の正体を知り、殺すことを急がないということは、あなたは{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の敵ではなく、皇帝に仕えていると推察されます。自己紹介をしましょう。帝国の異端審問庁、栄誉ある『純血の団』のインテロゲイター、ハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスと申します。お話しさせていただいているのはどちら様で？」
languages.original_text: "Yes." {n}The man turns away slightly to clear his throat. The room starts to get noticeably warmer.{/n} "Since you know who I am and are in no hurry to kill me, I infer that you serve the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, not His enemies. Allow me to introduce myself — Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos. With whom do I have the pleasure of speaking?"

traits.locale_text: 「そうだ」{n} 男はわずかに背を向けて咳払いをした。部屋は明らかに暖かくなっていた。{/n}「私の正体を知り、殺すことを急がないということは、あなたは{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の敵ではなく、皇帝に仕えていると推察される。自己紹介をしよう。帝国の異端審問庁、神聖なる〈純血の団〉のハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスという。失礼だが、そちらは何者だ？」

languages.text: "Ja." {n}Der Mann wendet sich kurz ab und räuspert sich. Der Raum wird spürbar wärmer.{/n} "Da Ihr wisst, wer ich bin, und keine Anstalten macht, mich zu töten, dient Ihr vermutlich dem {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g}, nicht seinen Feinden. Gestattet mir, mich vorzustellen – Interrogator Heinrix van Calox von der ehrwürdigen Ordo Xenos der imperialen Inquisition. Mit wem habe ich das Vergnügen?"
languages.original_text: "Yes." {n}The man turns away slightly to clear his throat. The room starts to get noticeably warmer.{/n} "Since you know who I am and are in no hurry to kill me, I infer that you serve the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, not His enemies. Allow me to introduce myself — Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos. With whom do I have the pleasure of speaking?"

traits.locale_text: "Ja." {n}Der Mann wendet sich kurz ab und räuspert sich. Der Raum wird spürbar wärmer.{/n} "Da Ihr wisst, wer ich bin, und keine Anstalten macht, mich zu töten, dient Ihr vermutlich dem {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g}, nicht seinen Feinden. Gestattet mir, mich vorzustellen – Interrogator Heinrix van Calox von der heiligen Ordo Xenos der imperialen Inquisition. Mit wem habe ich das Vergnügen?"

languages.text: « Oui. » {n}L'homme se détourne légèrement pour s'éclaircir la gorge. La température de la pièce commence à se réchauffer sensiblement.{/n} « Puisque vous savez qui je suis et que vous ne ressentez pas un besoin urgent de me tuer, j'en déduis que vous servez l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}, pas ses ennemis. Permettez-moi donc de me présenter, interrogateur Heinrix van Calox, du vénérable Ordo Xénos de l'Inquisition Impériale. À qui ai-je le plaisir de m'adresser ? »
languages.original_text: "Yes." {n}The man turns away slightly to clear his throat. The room starts to get noticeably warmer.{/n} "Since you know who I am and are in no hurry to kill me, I infer that you serve the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, not His enemies. Allow me to introduce myself — Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos. With whom do I have the pleasure of speaking?"

traits.locale_text: « Oui. » {n}L'homme se détourne légèrement pour s'éclaircir la gorge. La température de la pièce commence à réchauffer sensiblement.{/n} « Puisque vous savez qui je suis et que vous ne ressentez pas un besoin urgent de me tuer, j'en déduis que vous servez l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}, pas ses ennemis. Permettez-moi donc de me présenter, interrogateur Heinrix van Calox, du Saint Ordo Xénos de l'Inquisition Impériale. À qui ai-je le plaisir ? »

languages.text: «Sí». {n}El hombre se gira ligeramente para carraspear. La sala empieza a volverse considerablemente más cálida.{/n} «Dado que sabe quién soy y no parece tener prisa por matarme, entiendo que sirve al {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} y no a sus enemigos. Permítame que me presente: Interrogador Heinrix van Calox del Ordo Xenos de la Inquisición Imperial. ¿Con quién tengo el placer de hablar?».
languages.original_text: "Yes." {n}The man turns away slightly to clear his throat. The room starts to get noticeably warmer.{/n} "Since you know who I am and are in no hurry to kill me, I infer that you serve the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, not His enemies. Allow me to introduce myself — Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos. With whom do I have the pleasure of speaking?"

traits.locale_text: «Sí». {n}El hombre se gira ligeramente para carraspear. La sala empieza a volverse considerablemente más cálida.{/n} «Dado que sabe quién soy y no parece tener prisa por matarme, entiendo que sirve al {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} y no a Sus enemigos. Deje que me presente: soy el interrogador Heinrix van Calox del Santo Ordo Xenos de la Inquisición Imperial. ¿Con quién tengo el placer de hablar?».

languages.original_text: "Yes." {n}The man turns away slightly to clear his throat. The room starts to get noticeably warmer.{/n} "Since you know who I am and are in no hurry to kill me, I infer that you serve the Emperor, not His enemies. Allow me to introduce myself — Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos. With whom do I have the pleasure of speaking?"

languages.text: "Evet." {n}Adam, boğazını temizlemek için hafifçe arkasını dönüyor. Oda bariz şekilde ısınmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Kim olduğumu bildiğinize ve beni öldürmeye kalkmadığınıza göre, düşmanlarımıza değil de {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator'a{/g} hizmet ettiğiniz sonucuna varıyorum. Kendimi tanıtayım: Bendeniz, İmparatorluk Engizisyonu'ndan saygın Zeno Nizamı mensubu Sorgucu Heinrix van Calox. Kiminle konuşma şerefine nail oluyorum?"
languages.original_text: "Yes." {n}The man turns away slightly to clear his throat. The room starts to get noticeably warmer.{/n} "Since you know who I am and are in no hurry to kill me, I infer that you serve the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, not His enemies. Allow me to introduce myself — Interrogator Heinrix van Calox of the Imperial Inquisition's esteemed Ordo Xenos. With whom do I have the pleasure of speaking?"

traits.locale_text: "Evet." {n}Adam, boğazını temizlemek için hafifçe arkasını dönüyor. Oda bariz şekilde ısınmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Kim olduğumu bildiğinize ve beni öldürmeye kalkmadığınıza göre, düşmanlarımıza değil de {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}'a hizmet ettiğiniz sonucuna varıyorum. Kendimi tanıtayım: Bendeniz, İmparatorluk Engizisyonu'ndan saygın Zeno Nizamı mensubu Sorgucu Heinrix van Calox. Kiminle konuşma şerefine nail oluyorum?"
